fulltext:
EXPERIENCE
SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER
ORIENT SOFTWARE  |  FEB 2020 - PRESENT
PROJECT: BRAVOSUITE | FEB 2020 - PRESENT
Bravo is a job marketplace website to help recruiters find
suitable candidates.
Technologies: 
ASP.NET Core 3.1, Web API, Angular 7, RabbitMQ,
Microservices architecture, MongoDB, Elasticsearch.
Responsibilities: 
Implement main functions of the system.
Estimate task
Optimize, review, refactor code. Help other team
members to follow coding conventions, patterns.
SOFTWARE ENGINEER
GROOVE TECHNOLOGY  |  JAN 2019 - FEB 2020
PROJECT: ADJUNO | JAN 2019 - PRESENT
Providing goods management system, the process of ordering,
inspection, shipping, quality checking, network supplier
management.
Technologies: 
ASP.NET Core, Web Api, ASP.NET MVC, Angular 7
Responsibilities: 
Optimize SQL query, code, maintain the system.
SOFTWARE ENGINEER
FUTURIFY CO., LTD  |  APRIL 2017 - JAN 2019
PROJECT: RVEZY.COM | APRIL 2017 - JAN 2019
A peer to peer sharing marketplace website for listing and
renting RVs across Canada
Technologies: ASP.NET Core, Microservices architecture, Web
Api, AngularJS, Stripe, AWS Services(S3, EC2, Lambda,...),
RabbitMq, Hubspot, Integrate Payment Gateway (Stripe).
Responsibilities: 
Develop booking system, insurance claim module and
other priority features of the whole system.
Integrate the website with other 3rd party platforms
Optimize the code to improve website performance.
Fix bugs, maintain system, code review, refactor code,
deploy. 
PROJECT: HOOZING.COM | MAY 2018 - AUG 2018
Hoozing is a marketplace website helping foreigners rent
houses and apartments in Vietnam. 
Technologies: 
ASP.NET MVC5, AngularJS.
AWS ElasticSearch
Responsibilities: 
Develop main functions of the system. 
Integrate the website with other 3rd party platforms.
Fix bugs, code review, deploy. 
PROJECT: PHIBIOUS | DEC 2018 - APR 2019
Phibious is a fashion marketplace website that helps users
contact with the sellers easier.
Technologies: 
Using Machine Learning to build a recommendation
system.
Django framework.
Responsibilities: 
Code, research more about Machine Learning. 
HA THE
HOANG
FULL-STACK DEVELOPER
CONTACT
Phone: 0963 225 084
Email: hathehoanghayen@gmail.com
PROFILE
I am a full-stack developer with 4 years
experience in web development. I used
to work on the various types of mission-
critical applications using Microsoft
technologies, Python and other latest
frameworks. I believe what I have gained
in the previous works that can help me
be able to adapt your company
requirements for the opening job.
SKILL SETS
C# .NET
Python
Javascript, Typescript
HTML, CSS, SCSS
AngularJS, Angular 2+
ASP.NET MVC, Web API, .NET Core
Django framework
MS SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDb
AWS Services: RDS, EC2, S3,
Cloudfront, Elasticsearch, ...
Azure DevOps Pipelines
Git, SVN
Agile development method
Soft skills: self-learning, teamwork,
time management
EDUCATION
BACHELOR OF INFORMATION
TECHNOLOGY
UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE  |  2013 - 2017

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
